title: SP6 "Episode of Luffy: Adventure on Hand Island"[4]Transliteration: "Episōdo obu Rufi – Hando Airando no Bōken" (Japanese:エピソードオブルフィ ～ハンドアイランドの冒険～) Hiroyuki Morita, Mitsuru Hongo Yasuyuki Tsutsumi December 15, 2012(2012-12-15) 102 minutes
transformers_text: SP 6 Episode of Luffy Adventure on Hand Island 4 Transliteration Ep is do o bu Ru fi Hand o A iran do no B ken Japanese Hiroyuki Morita Mitsuru Hong o Yasuyuki Tsu t sumi December 15 2012 2012 12 15 102 minutes An original story with flashback sequences remaking Luffy's history with Shanks and first encounter with Coby n 3 Luffy befriends wax sculptor Diego and helps free his son Regis who has been imprisoned by corrupt Marine Commodore Bil i
